content:
Let me try that again.

I think I'll go with chicken breast, it's a classic combination and I have some chicken breast in my fridge already. I'll make sure to marinate it in a mixture of fish sauce, lime juice, and chili flakes before adding it to the stir-fry. By the way, I recently made a amazing vegetable stir-fry with tofu at home, and it turned out really well. Do you have any tips on how to cook the vegetables to achieve the perfect texture?
